*** Bug 8083 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

The actions need to be set disabled until they received the first selection 
changed callback.

Back to those three flavors of ControlActionDelegate ;-)
The code was relying on the selection tracking of the DebugSelectionManager to 
set the enabled state of the DebugMenu ControlActionDelegates.  This works fine 
as long as you get a selection change in the LaunchView.  If you switch to the 
debug perspective with nothing happening in the LaunchView, the DebugMenu 
control action delegates remained enabled (WRONG).  Reworked the initialize 
code so that all flavors set the initial enabled state of the actions based on 
the selection in the window when the delegate is created.

I made changes to ControlActionDelegate and ConsoleTerminateActionDelegate.
Please verify (DarinW)
